name: Trapper Gloves
description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by 30%.

name: Padded Jaws
description:
These Padded Jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
Bear Traps immobilise Survivors without damaging them.
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints for trapping Survivors.

name: Makeshift Wrap
description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
The Trapper can no longer be caught in his own Bear Traps, they will instead be disarmed when he steps onto them.

name: Bear Oil
description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.
Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

name: Wax Brick
description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by 33%.

name: Serrated Jaws
description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Hemorrhage Status Effect until healed.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

name: Lengthened Jaws
description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.
Survivors who escape from Bear Traps suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.

name: Coffee Grinds
description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grinds.
Grants a 5% Haste IconStatusEffects haste.png Status Effect for 5 seconds after setting a Bear Trap.

name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Trap's hold.
Decreases the Bear Trap Disarm speed by 25%.

name: Trapper Bag
description:
A cured leather waist bag.
Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
Start with 1 additional Bear Trap.
Increases the Bear Trap Carrying capacity by 1 Bear Trap.

name: Tar Bottle
description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
Darkens the Bear Trap.

name: Secondary Coil
description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by 50%.

name: Rusted Jaws
description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Fastening Tools
description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by 25%.
Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by 50%.

name: Trapper Sack
description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning throughout the Trial Grounds.
The Trapper is unable to pick up Bear Traps once placed.

name: Tension Spring
description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
Automatically resets the Bear Trap 2 seconds after a Survivor escaped from it.

name: Oily Coil
description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
When resetting a Bear Trap, the Aura of the Survivor who had disarmed it is reveal for 5 seconds.

name: Honing Stone
description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the Honing Stone sharpens its blades.
The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.
Survivors caught in a Bear Trap, who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State.

name: Iridescent Stone
description:
Bear Traps sharpened with the sickly gleaming Iridescent Stone seem to gain a life of their own.
Every 30 seconds, a randomly chosen disarmed Bear Trap is automatically reset and armed.

name: Bloody Coil
description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more dangerous.
When a healthy Survivor disarms a Bear Trap, the Bloody Coil exacts its price, putting the Survivor into the Injured State.

name: "The Serpent" - Soot
description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Breaking Pallets or Damaging Generators cause The Wraith to fully uncloak.

name: "The Hound" - Soot
description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Pools of Blood appear bright red to The Wraith while cloaked.

name: "The Ghost" - Soot
description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the spirit world, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Continues to suppress the Terror Radius and the Red Stain of The Wraith for 6 seconds after uncloaking.

name: "The Beast" - Soot
description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the Realm of Fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
The Terror Radius of The Wraith is no longer suppressed while cloaked.
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Stalking and Surprise Attack Score Events.

name: Bone Clapper
description:
A Bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone.
Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
Survivors are unable to discern distance and direction of the Wailing Bell's tolls.

name: "Blink" - Mud
description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Cloaking time by 40%.

name: "Windstorm" - Mud
description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by 5%.

name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud
description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by 8%.

name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud
description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: "Windstorm" - White
description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by 7%

name: "Swift Hunt" - White
description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by 10%.

name: "Shadow Dance" - White
description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for Pallet Breaking, Generator Damaging, and Window Vaulting by 40% while cloaked.

name: "Blink" - White
description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for Pallet Breaking, Generator Damaging, and Window Vaulting by 40% while cloaked.
icon:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Cloaking time by 60%.

name: "Blind Warrior" - White
description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Mangled and Hemorrhage Status Effects until fully healed.

name: "Windstorm" - Blood
description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +9%.

name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood
description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by 12%.

name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood
description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for Pallet Breaking, Generator Damaging, and Window Vaulting by 60% while cloaked.

name: "All Seeing" - Blood
description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:
When cloaked, the Auras of Survivors are revealed to you within 8 meters of your location.

name: Coxcombed Clapper
description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound.
A malevolent Aura emanates from it.
Silences the Wailing Bell tolls.

name: "All Seeing" - Spirit
description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, ominously glows on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:
When cloaked, the intensity of the Aura of Generators reveal their Repair progression.

name: Steel Toe Boots
description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
Reduces Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by 12%.

name: Junkyard Air Filter
description:
A cracked and dusty filter.
It still manages to work better than the stock model.
Increases Overheat limit of the Chainsaw by 20 Charges.

name: Heavy Clutch
description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.
Decreases Collision Zone width of the Chainsaw by 30%.

name: Speed Limiter
description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
Grants 100% Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.

name: Dad's Boots
description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
Increases Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by 28%.

name: Punctured Muffler
description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.
Increases Chainsaw Cooling speed by 50%.

name: Off-brand Motor Oil
description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
Reduces the range within which Chainsaw noises can be heard by 30%.

name: Death Engravings
description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took.
Fills the user with determination.
Increases Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by 15%.
Decreases Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by 14%.
Increases Charge time of the Chainsaw by 12%.

name: Big Buckle
description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol' country boys.
Decreases the Terror Radius by 8 meters while overheated.

name: Mother's Helpers
description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson's purse.
Side effects include nervousness and irritability.
Reduces Charge time of the Chainsaw by 18% for 30 seconds after being stunned by a Pallet.
"Doctor, please, more of these!" — Evelyn Thompson

name: Low Kickback Chains
description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
Reduces Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by 28%.

name: Leafy Mash
description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter's scent when stalking prey.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds after hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw.

name: Doom Engravings
description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in the Fog.
Fills the user with determination.
Increases Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by 20%.
Decreases Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by 14%.
Increases Charge time of the Chainsaw by 12%.

name: Black Grease
description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.
Increases Charge speed of the Chainsaw by 18% for 30 seconds after being blinded.

name: Tuned Carburettor
description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
Reduces Charge time of the Chainsaw by 25%.
Decreases base Movement speed of The Hillbilly to 4.4 m/s.

name: Spiked Boots
description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
Increases Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by 44%.
Increases Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by 28%.

name: Pighouse Gloves
description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances.
Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.
Increases Action speed when damaging Generators and breaking Pallets or Breakable Walls by 20% while overheated.
Decreases Pallet Stun duration by 50%.
"Ain't no mess can stain a hard-workin' man's soul." — Max Thompson Sr.

name: LoPro Chains
description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
Continue the Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall with the Chainsaw.
Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall are only damaged for a single Health State.

name: Apex Muffler
description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
Silences the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside The Hillbilly's Terror Radius.

name: Iridescent Brick
description:
Once representative of Max Junior's confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room's barricade came crashing down.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds.
"What kinda ruckus you stirrin', boy?" — Max Thompson Sr.

name: Wooden Horse
description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
Reduces the additional Fatigue duration from missed Blink Attacks by -0.5 seconds.

name: White Nit Comb
description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
Decreases the Lunge range of Blink Attacks by 50%.

name: Plaid Flannel
description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.
The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of the Blink.

name: Metal Spoon
description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.
Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack increases the volume of their Grunts of Pain by 50% for 60 seconds.

name: Pocket Watch
description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.
Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by 13%.

name: Dull Bracelet
description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.
Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by 4 meters.

name: Dark Cincture
description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.
Taken from Father Campbell's body.
Reduces the Power Token Recharge time by 0.4 seconds per Token.

name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.
Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
Reduces the additional Fatigue duration from Chain Blinks by 1 second.

name: Bad Man Keepsake
description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack reveals their Aura if they are healing or being healed within 28 meters of The Nurse.
This effect lasts for 60 seconds after the Blink Attack.

name: Spasmodic Breath
description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".
Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack causes the following effects for 60 seconds:
Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.6 m/s.
Disables Spencer's Last Breath.

name: Heavy Panting
description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from the "Fat Orderly" Kavanagh.
Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
Increases the maximum range of the Blink by 4 meters.
Increases the Charge time of the Blink by 20%.

name: Fragile Wheeze
description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.
Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
Reduces the Power Token Recharge time by 0.6 seconds per Token.

name: Ataxic Respiration
description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the "Catatonic Boy".
Normally stable and calm, becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
Reduces Fatigue duration from Blinks by 0.25 seconds.

name: Anxious Gasp
description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the "Anxious Girl", which The Nurse was fond of.
Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
Blinking past a Survivor causes them to scream.
Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Orderly Harvey Kavanagh, the "Fat Orderly".
In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
Increases the maximum range of the Blink by 6 meters.
Increases the Charge time of the Blink by 30%.

name: Jenner's Last Breath
description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Patient Mary Jenner, the "Anxious Girl".
In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
Press the Active Ability button during the Chain Blink Window to use Jenner's Last Breath:
Immediately Blink back to the previous location.

name: Campbell's Last Breath
description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Priest Father Campbell.
In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
Immediately Blink at half-charge in the direction The Nurse is facing after reappearing from a fully charged Blink.

name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Patient known as the "Bad Man".
In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 16 seconds.
This effect has a cool-down of 60 seconds.

name: Torn Bookmark
description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.
Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
Increases available Power Tokens by 1 Token.
Increases the Power Recharge time by 50%.

name: Matchbox
description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.
Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.2 m/s for the entire Trial.
Reduces available Power Tokens by 1 Token.

name: Tacky Earrings
description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by 10%.

name: Memorial Flower
description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
Increases the Stalk rate by 11%.

name: Boyfriend's Memo
description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
Increases the range of The Shape's Lunge Attack by 50% while in Evil Within I.
"The note is signed: D."

name: Blond Hair
description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 10 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 50%.

name: Reflective Fragment
description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 2 seconds.

name: Jewellery
description:
A large necklace made of beads and inexpensive metals.
One of Judith's favourites.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by 20%.

name: Hair Brush
description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 20 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 50%.

name: Glass Fragment
description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.
It is impossible to determine its origin.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I, are revealed for 3 seconds.

name: Dead Rabbit
description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
Reduces The Shape's Terror Radius by 25% while in Evil Within II.
Increases The Shape's Terror Radius by +25% while in Evil Within III.

name: Mirror Shard
description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 5 seconds.

name: Judith's Journal
description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.
Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
Increases the Stalk rate on the Obsession by 40%.

name: Jewellery Box
description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by 30%.

name: J. Myers Memorial
description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
Increases the Stalk rate by 25%.

name: Hair Bow
description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 30 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 50%.

name: Vanity Mirror
description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
The Auras of all Survivors within 16 meters of The Shape are revealed while Stalking in Evil Within II.
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Hit Score Events in the Brutality Category.
Grants 150% bonus Bloodpoints for Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within II.

name: Tombstone Piece
description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within III, resetting it to Evil Within II.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 150%.

name: Scratched Mirror
description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
The Auras of all Survivors within 32 meters of The Shape are revealed while Stalking in Evil Within I.
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Hit Score Events in the Brutality Category.
Grants 200% bonus Bloodpoints for Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within I.

name: Lock of Hair
description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 40 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 100%.

name: Judith's Tombstone
description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 200%.
Reduces the Movement speed of The Shape by 9% while in Evil Within III.
"Here lies our beloved daughter."

name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.
Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
Grants unlimited duration to Evil Within III.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by 200%.

name: Rope Necklet
description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by 15%.

name: Powdered Eggshell
description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by 25%.

name: Dead Fly Mud
description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.
Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by 20%.

name: Bog Water
description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by 10%.

name: Pussy Willow Catkins
description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 3 seconds.

name: Half Eggshell
description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by 30%.

name: Dragonfly Wings
description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.
Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by 25%.

name: Cypress Necklet
description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by 20%.

name: Bloodied Water
description:
ainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by 20%.

name: Willow Wreath
description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 5 seconds.

name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by 25%.

name: Dried Cicada
description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.
Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by 30%.

name: Cracked Turtle Egg
description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by 35%.

name: Bloodied Mud
description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.
The bloody layers empower the mud.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by 30%.

name: Scarred Hand
description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Mud Phantasms have collision with Survivors.
Grants 300% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Disables The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.
Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.
"..." — The Butcher

name: Rusty Shackles
description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Tripped Phantasm Traps do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.
Tripped Phantasm Traps do not give any indication of having been tripped to Survivors.

name: Grandma's Heart
description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the following effects for its tripped duration:
Suppresses the Terror Radius of The Hag.
Increases the Fake Terror Radius of the Mud Phantasms to 16 meters.
"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma

name: Disfigured Ear
description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear.
Deformed due to several hits to the head.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the Survivor to be deafened for 6 seconds.

name: Waterlogged Shoe
description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Increases the Movement speed of The Hag by 4.5% to 4.6 m/s.
Survivors suffer from a Hindered IconStatusEffects hindered.png Status Effect while inside a Phantasm Trap's Trigger range, reducing their Movement speed by 9%.
Disables the ability of The Hag to teleport to triggered Phantasm Traps.
Waterlogged Shoe trumps all other Add-ons.

name: Mint Rag
description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Grants The Hag the ability to teleport to any untripped Phantasm Trap at will.
Mint Rag applies a cool-down of 15 seconds to teleports between un-tripped Phantasm Traps.
This cool-down does not extend to regular teleports to tripped Phantasm Traps.

name: Mouldy Electrode
description:
A mouldy electrode which can nevertheless conduct a weak electrical current.
Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by 2 meters.

name: Maple Knight
description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple.
This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
Reveals the Area of Effect of Shock Theray.

name: "Order" - Class I
description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by 2 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:
Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.

name: "Calm" - Class I
description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by 4 meters.
Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by 4 meters.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
Madness II: Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

name: Polished Electrode
description:
A like-new standard electrode equipment to conduct electro-convulsive treatments.
Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by 3 meters.

name: "Restraint" - Class II
description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucination in the patient.
When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 1 second.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by 6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.

name: "Order" - Class II
description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by 4 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:
Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.
"Side effects are very rare." — Léry's Memorial Institute

name: "Discipline" - Class II
description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage.
Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 0.1 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.
"We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." — Léry's Memorial Institute

name: "Calm" - Class II
description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by 6 meters.
Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by 6 meters.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
Madness II': Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
Madness III': Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
"Electro-convulsive therapy is one of the safest medical procedures." — Léry's Memorial Institute

name: Scrapped Tape
description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
Changes Shock Therapy's Area of Effect into a hollow ring, placed 8 meters in front of The Doctor, with an outer radius of 4.2 meters and an inner radius of 3 meters.

name: Interview Tape
description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an unedited interview of a victim.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
Changes Shock Therapy's Area of Effect into a narrow beam 24 meters in length and 2 meters in width.

name: High Stimulus Electrode
description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very high charges for a longer period of time.
Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by 4 meters.

name: "Restraint" - Class III
description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 2 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by 6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.

name: "Discipline" - Class III
description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage.
Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 0.2 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.
"Respect of our patients is at the core of our principles." — Léry's Memorial Institute

name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated.
Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 3 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:
Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by 6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.
"I CAN SEE THEIR DISGUSTING ILLNESSES ." — Unsigned Notes (potentially Herman Carter)

name: "Order" - Carter's Notes
description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by 6 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:
Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.
"The stimulus must be kept active at a convulsive level." — Herman Carter

name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes
description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.
Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 0.3 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:
Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.
"To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use maximum levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." — Herman Carter

name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes
description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by 8 meters.
Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by 8 meters.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:
Madness II: Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
"Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me peace for the time it lasts." — Herman Carter

name: Iridescent Queen
description:
A glass-like queen chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
It cannot be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.
Any Survivor struck by the Shock Therapy or Static Blast Attack acquires a lingering Static Charge.
The Static Charge remains with the Survivor until it is discharged.
Any time a Survivor is within 4 meters of a Survivor carrying a Static Charge, both receive a shock identical to a Shock Therapy Attack and the Static Charge is discharged immediately.
If Survivors are within 4 meters of one another when being struck by the same Shock Therapy or Static Blast Attack, they do not acquire a Static Charge.
"Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." — Herman Carter

name: Iridescent King
description:
A glass-like king chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from all available Afflictions: Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint.
Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends in Madness II and is constantly active in Madness III.
Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by 6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the various Afflictions, including the Auras of Illusionary Pallets and Doctors.
"Gazing into the iridescent glass is plunging one's self into madness."

name: Yellowed Cloth
description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by 10%.

name: Coarse Stone
description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.
A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by 50% until they are healed, if they are hit by Hatchets.

name: Bandaged Haft
description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by 10%.

name: Amanita Toxin
description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
It numbs the mind.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Weighted Head
description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.
It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.

name: Shiny Pin
description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.
Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
Increases Movement speed during Wind-up by 5%.

name: Oak Haft
description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by 20%.

name: Manna Grass Braid
description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces Wind-up time by 8%.

name: Leather Loop
description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.
Start the Trial with 1 additional Hatchet.
Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Hatchet.

name: Venomous Concoction
description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

name: Rusty Head
description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled  Status Effect until healed.
Rusty Head does not stack.

name: Rose Root
description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by 20%.

name: Flower Babushka
description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces Wind-up time by 12%.

name: Deerskin Gloves
description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
Reduces Reload time at Lockers by 20%.

name: Wooden Fox
description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.
A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds when Reloading.

name: Infantry Belt
description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.
Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.
Start the Trial with 2 additional Hatchets.
Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Hatchets.

name: Glowing Concoction
description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.

name: Begrimed Head
description:
This Hatchet head is stained with a foul substance that afflicts anyone who it touches with debilities.
Survivors hit with Hunting Hatchets suffer from the Mangled and Hemorrhage Status Effects until healed.
Begrimed Head does not stack.

name: Soldier's Puttee
description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier.
It provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
Increases the Movement speed of The Huntress to 4.6 m/s whenever she is out of Hatchets.

name: Iridescent Head
description:
A glass-like Hatchet head moulded from The Fog itself.
The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
Survivors hit by Hatchets are automatically put into the Dying State.
You can only carry a maximum of 1 Hatchet.
Iridescent Head trumps all other Add-ons.
"The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."

name: Vegetable Oil
description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Bubba's Chainsaw by 0.3 seconds.

name: Spark Plug
description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.
Decreases Token Recharge time by 0.5 seconds.

name: Speed Limiter
description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
Grants 100% Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.

name: Chainsaw File
description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
Decreases duration of the Tantrum by 0.5 seconds.

name: Long Guide Bar
description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.
Increases Revving threshold before triggering a Tantrum by 2 seconds.

name: Primer Bulb
description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.
Decreases Token Recharge time by 1 second.

name: Knife Scratches
description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade.
Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
Increases Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by 2%.
Increases Charge time of Bubba's Chainsaw by 12%.

name: Homemade Muffler
description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.
Decreases duration of the Tantrum by 1 second.

name: Chilli
description:
A big bowl of steaming Chilli to keep you fresh and strong.
Increases duration of the Chainsaw Dash and Chainsaw Dash Window by 0.25 seconds.
"I got some good barbecue here!" — Drayton Sawyer

name: The Grease
description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers.
Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.
Increases Revving threshold before triggering a Tantrum by 3 seconds.

name: The Beast's Marks
description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
Increases Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by 3%.
Increases Charge time of Bubba's Chainsaw by 12%.

name: Shop Lubricant
description:
An oil specifically formulated for Chainsaws.
A special additive prevents oil throw off.
Downing a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw while no other Survivors are in the Terror Radius will cloak that Survivor's Aura from other Survivors for 20 seconds.

name: Grisly Chains
description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed when hit with Bubba's Chainsaw.
Grisly Chains does not stack with other instances of the Mangled Status Effect.

name: Begrimed Chains
description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.
Survivors drop their Items when hit with Bubba's Chainsaw.

name: Rusted Chains
description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Survivors injured with Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 90 seconds.
Rusted Chains does not stack with other instances of the Broken Status Effect.

name: Light Chassis
description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar. Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.
While revving, see the Auras of all Survivors within 8 meters.

name: Depth Gauge Rake
description:
Tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
Increases available Tokens by 1 Token.
Decreases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw Sweep by 18%.
Decreases the Chainsaw Dash Movement speed by 2%.

name: Award-winning Chilli
description:
A big bowl of spicy Chilli made famous thanks to prime meat.
Increases duration of the Chainsaw Dash and Chainsaw Dash Window by 0.5 seconds.
"The secret's in the meat" — Drayton Sawyer

name: Iridescent Flesh
description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh.
The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.
Replenishes all Tokens when hitting a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw.
Limits the maximum duration of the Tantrum to 5 seconds.
"There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true.
Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." — Pam Jones

name: Carburettor Tunning Guide
description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburettor.
The Chainsaw Dash automatically consumes all Tokens.
Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by 0.5 seconds.
Decreases the Recharge rate of the Chainsaw Sweep by 0.28 c/s.
Decreases the Chainsaw Dash Movement speed by 2%.

name: Wool Shirt
description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by 4%.

name: Sheep Block
description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

name: Kid's Drawing
description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
Gain an extra 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of triggered Dream Snares by 10%.

name: Garden Rake
description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.

name: Prototype Claws
description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Outdoor Rope
description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
Increases the audible range of Generator-Repair noises by 8 meters.

name: Nancy's Sketch
description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by 2% for each Survivor inside the Dream World.

name: Green Dress
description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by 4%.
The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 3 seconds.

name: Cat Block
description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Hemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Unicorn Block
description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Paint Thinner
description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 6 seconds.

name: Nancy's Masterpiece
description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by 3% for each Survivor inside the Dream World.

name: Jump Rope
description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by 50%, if they are the Dream World.

name: Blue Dress
description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by 4%.
The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Pill Bottle
description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called "Zoneral".
Reduces the Distance range at which awake Survivors see The Nightmare intermittently to 12 to 24 meters.
The Nightmare is invisible to awake Survivors beyond 24 meters and when he is carrying another Survivor.

name: Swing Chains
description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
The Footstep noises of Survivors are 50% louder.

name: Class Photo
description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
Causes every Generator to spew blood while channelling Dream Projection and suppresses the Husk.
The Nightmare is unable to cancel Dream Projection once initiated.

name: "Z" Block
description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Hemorrhage Status Effect for 90 seconds.

name: Red Paint Brush
description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
Causes all Survivors to start the Trial inside the Dream World.
Survivors are unable to wake themselves up by failing Skill Checks.

name: Black Box
description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
Recently opened Exit Gates are blocked for 15 seconds.

name: Shattered Syringe
description:
Symbol of a broken way of life.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by 25%.

name: John's Medical File
description:
The medical file of a cancerous man.
Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
Increases Crouch Movement speed by 6%.

name: Interlocking Razor
description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box:
The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
Failing a Skill Check at Jigsaw Boxes will apply Deep Wound Status Effect to Injured Survivors.

name: Combat Straps
description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
Increases the Crouch State Transitioning speed by 30%.

name: Workshop Grease
description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.
Increases the Charge speed of the Ambush Dash by 50%.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by 25%.

name: Utility Blades
description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Sharp blades attached to the Trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Hemorrhage Status Effect.

name: Razor Wires
description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box:
The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search them.
Failing a Skill Check at Jigsaw Boxes will injure Healthy Survivors.

name: Last Will
description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
Increases Movement speed during an Ambush Dash by 6%.
Increases the Charge time of Ambush Dash by 33%.

name: Face Mask
description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target, making it hard to concentrate.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Traps suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
Face Mask does not hide the Auras of the Jigsaw Boxes.

name: Slow-Release Toxin
description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
A poison that is not fatal, but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

name: Rusty Attachments
description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Injured Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Rules Set No.2
description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
Disables the Survivors' ability to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes until their Reverse Bear Trap is activated.
"Listen, there are rules." — Jigsaw

name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan
description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by +1 Trap.
Each time a Generator is completed, the Death Timer of all active Reverse Bear Traps is reduced by 10 seconds.
Increases the default Death Timer duration by 10 seconds.

name: Bag of Gears
description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
Increases the Attaching speed of Reverse Bear Traps by 50%.
Decreases the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by 14%.

name: Tampered Timer
description:
A timer that has been fiddled with.
A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
Reduces the default Death Timer duration of Reverse Bear Trap by 20 seconds.

name: Jigsaw's Sketch
description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in detail on a sheet of paper.
Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by 1 Trap.
Whenever a Survivor wearing a Reverse Bear Trap is repairing a Generator that Generator's Aura is highlighted to you.

name: Crate of Gears
description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
Increases the Attaching speed of Reverse Bear Traps by 50%.
Decreases the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by 25%.

name: Amanda's Secret
description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses.
Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap trigger a Loud Noise Notification.
Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap have their Aura revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Disables your ability to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes.

name: Amanda's Letter
description:
A blackmailing Letter for the attention of Amanda.
Fills the reader with rage and focus.
When crouched, the Auras of all Survivors within 16 meters are revealed to you.
Reduces available Reverse Bear Traps by 2 Traps.
"Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." — Amanda's Letter

name: Video Tape
description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
All Survivors start the Trial with Reverse Bear Traps installed.

name: VHS Porn
description:
An all time classic.
You will not see things quite the same again.
Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds are yellow.
Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds are purple.

name: Robin Feather
description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by 40%.

name: Party Bottle
description:
Be the life of the party!
Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 bonus Bloodpoints.
Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual Gas effect.

name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
Increases the Throw speed of the Bottle by 25%.
Decreases the Throw angle of the Bottle by 15°.

name: Thick Cork Stopper
description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
Reduces the Reload time by 0.5 seconds.

name: Sticky Soda Bottle
description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
Start the Trial with 1 additional Bottle.
Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Bottle.

name: Starling Feather
description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by 50%.

name: Solvent Jug
description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
Increases the Invigoration duration by 1 second.

name: Kerosene Can
description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
description:
An odourless syrupy liquid with high corrosiveness.
Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Spirit of Hartshorn
description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.
One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds by 20%.

name: Smelly Inner Soles
description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
Increases Movement speed while Reloading by 66%.

name: Flask of Bleach
description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
Increases the Hindered Penalty from Intoxication by an additional 4%.

name: Bottle of Chloroform
description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds by 20%.

name: Garish Make-up Kit
description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.
The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
Increases the Invigoration duration by 2 seconds.

name: Ether 15 Vol%
description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
Increases the Intoxication duration by 1 second.

name: Cigar Box
description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.
Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
Any Invigorated Player sees the Auras of all other Players within a radius of 16 meters.

name: Cheap Gin Bottle
description:
The only remnant of a cheap good time and one hell of a headache.
Start the Trial with 2 additional Bottles.
Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Bottles.

name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.
Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
The Auras of both Intoxicated and Invigorated Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger
description:
The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.
Faintly fragrant.
Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
Survivors hit directly with the Bottle suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they are Intoxicated.
Reduces available Bottles by 2 Bottles.

name: Zōri
description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by 5%.

name: Shiawase Amulet
description:
A Talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
Extends the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by 10% (0.03 c/s).

name: Origami Crane
description:
One of the one thousand Orizuru for your wish to come true.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by 10% (0.03 c/s).

name: Gifted Bamboo Comb
description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle dishevelled hair.
Increases the Activation Charge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by 15%.

name: White Hair Ribbon
description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
Increases the Activation Charge rate of the Phase-Walk by 20%.

name: Rin's Broken Watch
description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass.
The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
Increases the Power Recovery rate by 15% (0.05 c/s).

name: Muddy Sports Day Cap
description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo.
Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by 10%.

name: Kaiun Talisman
description:
A Talisman to get luck on your side.
Extends the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by 1 second.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by 20% (0.0666 c/s).

name: Juniper Bonsai
description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree.
Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
Reduces the Passive Phasing cool-down by 1 second.
Increases the Passive Phasing duration by 50%.

name: Rusty Flute
description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
Increases the Power Recovery rate by 25% (0.0833 c/s).

name: Senko Hanabi
description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.
Ending a Phase-Walk causes the Husk to explode, blocking any Vault locations within 4 meters of its location for 5 seconds.

name: Katana Tsuba
description:
The hand-guard of an ancestral blade.
Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
Increases The Spirit's Reappearance duration after a Phase-Walk by 0.2 seconds.
Increases The Spirit's Reappearance Movement speed after a Phase-Walk by 5%.

name: Uchiwa
description:
A handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting when stunned by a Pallet.

name: Mother's Glasses
description:
A pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
Survivors coming within 2 meters of the Husk during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.

name: Yakuyoke Amulet
description:
A powerful Talisman to protect your endeavours from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
Increases the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by 3.5 seconds.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by 70% (0.2333 c/s).
Decreases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by 15%.

name: Wakizashi Saya
description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade.
Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
During a Phase-Walk, press the Active Ability button to immediately return to the Husk.

name: Furin
description:
A warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
Causes all Survivors to hear the Phase-Walk Sound cue.

name: Dried Cherry Blossom
description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower.
Once the symbol of mortality.
Coming within 4 meters of a Survivor during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible during a Phase-Walk.

name: Mother-Daughter Ring
description:
A silver ring engraved with "for my precious daughter".
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by 40%.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka's Haunting.

name: Kintsugi Teacup
description:
A cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold.
Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall.

name: Smiley Face Pin
description:
A friendly-looking yellow button used a sarcastic statement.
Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Blindness for 60 seconds.

name: Scratched Ruler
description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
Decreases Feral Frenzy recharge time by 5 seconds.

name: Mischief List
description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish; memento of brighter days.
Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by 2 seconds

name: Friendship Bracelet
description:
A wide gray and red braided rope bracelet. The inscription "F J S J
 can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
Increases duration of lunges during Feral Frenzy by 0.3 seconds

name: Never-Sleep Pills
description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or other draining activities.
The Legion's base move speed during Feral Frenzy is 4.6 m/s.
Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by 10 seconds.
Gain 100 to 500 bonus Bloodpoints for each successive hit on a Survivor during Feral Frenzy.

name: Mural Sketch
description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
Increases speed bonus per hit during Feral Frenzy to 0.3 m/s.

name: Julie's Mix Tape
description:
A dark mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy rock.
If The Legion is stunned while in Feral Frenzy, the power gauge refills once the duration of the stun ends.

name: Etched Ruler
description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
Survivors hit by a Feral Slash are inflicted with Oblivious for 60 seconds.

name: Defaced Smiley Pin
description:
A once friendly-looking bright yellow button of a defaced smiley. A signature icon of The Legion.
Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Mangled.
Mangled increases the time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: The Legion Pin
description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion. To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Broken for 60 seconds.
Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

name: Susie's Mix Tape
description:
A thrilling mix tape with energizing songs and intricate guitar riffs.
Increases Killer Instinct detection range by 20 meters.

name: Stylish Sunglasses
description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool. Their color tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
Shows the auras of Survivors who are mending within a 24-meter radius

name: Stolen Sketch Book
description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre, sketches.
During Feral Frenzy, from the second chained hit onward, hit Survivors drop their item.

name: Joey's Mix Tape
description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for when life's a bitch.
Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Hemorrhage until fully healed.
Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

name: Stab Wounds Study
description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library vulgarizing a study on lessions and stab wounds.
The auras of Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are shown for 4 seconds afterward.

name: Frank's Mix Tape
description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes. A track list of massive distortion and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
While using Feral Frenzy:
Damaging generators is 20% faster.
Breaking walls is 30% faster.
The Power gauge pauses while damaging a generator or breaking a wall.

name: Filthy Blade
description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
Increases time required for Survivors to mend by 4 seconds.

name: BFFs
description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace spit into four, one for each best friend.
Earn tokens for hitting Survivors during Feral Frenzy:
Second chained hit: 2 tokens.
Third chained hit: 3 tokens.
Fourth chained hit: 4 tokens.
Fifth chained hit: 5 tokens.
Once the gates are powered, if 15 or more tokens have been collected, gain a 4% movement speed boost when not using Feral Frenzy.

name: Iridescent Button
description:
A glass-like button molded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness. The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
During Feral Frenzy, any pallets you vault are immediately broken.

name: Fuming Mix Tape
description:
Dark beats, violent shreds, and unfathomable sounds from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
While using Feral Frenzy:
The repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.
Generators not being worked on regress.

name: Prayer Tablet Fragment
description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
Increases Object Infection duration by 40 seconds.
Increases Infection gained from infected Objects by 100%.
Grants 100% Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors directly.

name: Olibanum Incense
description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
The Auras of Survivors cleansing at Pools of Devotion are revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Limestone Seal
description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
Increases Object Infection duration by 20 seconds.

name: Healing Salve
description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two.
Applied on skin rashes.
Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 0.25 seconds.

name: Prophylactic Amulet
description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness.
Fills the wearer with devotion.
Decreases available Pools of Devotion by 2.

name: Potent Tincture
description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.
Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 0.4 seconds.

name: Haematite Seal
description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hard-stone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines.
Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
Increases Object Infection duration by 30 seconds.

name: Emetic Potion
description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed.
Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by 30%.

name: Blessed Apple
description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony.
Delicious.
Start the Trial with 2 Pools of Devotion already corrupted.

name: Rubbing Oil
description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality.
Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
Increases Charge rate of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 50%.

name: Infected Emetic
description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin.
The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by 40%.

name: Incensed Ointment
description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuses a sweet and earthy aroma.
Applied directly on infected skin.
Ingesting Corruption causes all Survivors within The Plague's Terror to scream and reveal their locations.

name: Exorcism Amulet
description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by 10 seconds.

name: Ashen Apple
description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes.
Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
Start the Trial with 2 Pools of Devotion already corrupted.
Increases available Pools of Devotion by 1.

name: Worship Tablet
description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
Increases Ingestion speed by 100%.
Increases Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by 4.4%.

name: Vile Emetic
description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.
Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 10%.

name: Severed Toe
description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.
Radiates with vile power.
Increases Infection gained from interacting with Objects by 50%.

name: Devotee's Amulet
description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by 20 seconds.

name: Iridescent Seal
description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.
Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
Each time a Generator is completed, The Plague is automatically granted Corrupt Purge.
Reduces duration of Corrupt Purge by 20 seconds.

name: Black Incense
description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.
The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
The Auras of infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.

name: "Philly"
description:
Stolen camera from a victim of Olsen's in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.
Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor by 20%.
"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I don't wanna forget any of it." - The Ghost Face

name: Walleye's Matchbook
description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville. A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue. One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
Decreases Night Shroud recovery time by 6 seconds.

name: Headline Cutouts
description:
Cutouts of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania. While Ghost Face only authored some of the headlines, he committed all the murders.
Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
Increases movement speed while stalking by 40%.

name: Cheap Cologne
description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol. Worn by Ghost Face to make his presence known. Reserved for impromptu visits.
Increases Marked duration by 10 seconds.

name: Telephoto Lens
description:
A manual focus lens to take pictures from afar without being noticed.
A Survivor that reveals The Ghost Face is inflicted with Oblivious for 60 seconds.

name: Olsen's Journal
description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries. The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.
A Survivor that is Marked is inflicted with Oblivious until the Mark expires.

name: Olsen's Address Book
description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing. All the Roseville murder victims are listed here, along with their phone number and address.
Survivors that are Marked reaveal their auras for 5 seconds when performing rushed actions.

name: Marked Map
description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida. Each X represents a victim of The Ghost Face. Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct after being revealed by 2 seconds.

name: Cinch Straps
description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
Night Shroud remains active after a failed basic attack.

name: Olsen's Wallet
description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in carsh, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim. Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
Breaking a pallet or wall immediatelly recharges Night Shroud.

name: Leather Knife Sheath
description:
Quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade. Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
Increases crouched movement speed by 10%.

name: Lasting Perfume
description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by Ghost Face to announce his presence. Reserved for victims he planned to write about/
Survivors that are on a hook take 3 seconds to reveal The Ghost Face

name: Knife Belt Clip
description:
Perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly. No one knows what you're planning to do tonight.
Reduces the Terror Radius by 8 meters while crouching.

name: Chewed Pen
description:
Blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA. Incriminating evidence that was never found.
Survivors that are in the dying state take 3 seconds to reveal The Ghost Face.

name: Victim's Detailed Routine
description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville. Compilling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate and counter their next move.
After being Marked, Survivors are inflicted with Exhausted for 5 seconds.

name: Night Vision Monocular
description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness. Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
